summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3957 for the improvement of West Nevada Street from 26th Avenue Southwest to the east line of Lot 28, Block 8, White & Manning Addition, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48199, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
